summary: AuthContext.tsx implements soft redirects to `/` on both manual logout and idle auto-logout, and adds an app-initiated post-login admin-only redirect to `/studio`. No evidence in the provided diff summary of introducing `/creator-zone` or new routes. Two non-functional/documentation/state-tracking files were also modified, which were not explicitly requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified documentation/summary file content unrelated to the requested redirect logic changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scopes changes to redirect behavior and explicitly warns against broader changes; updating a file-summary artifact is not requested by any requirement.
BuildRequest does not request updating project metadata/state files; only redirect logic changes are required.
